DOC.criteria: Provision inform consent Female and/or male age 18 year Intermittent selfcatheterization primary bladder management method , define normal catheterization frequency least 4 time daily Reuse silicon , rubber ( latex ) plastic ( e.g . vinyl , PVC ) catheter Accustomed intermittent catheterization user , define intermittent catheterization use least 3 month Able use catheter size : 40 cm , CH12 CH14 ; 16 '' , FR12 FR14 ; 15 cm , CH10 CH12 ; 6 '' , FR10 FR12 ; Antibiotic treatment within 4 week prior study inclusion Drug alcohol abuse disease addiction Immunocompromising diseases medication Known urological/renal anatomical abnormality potential impact subjectÂ´s compliance judge investigator Diagnosis severe fecal incontinence may compromise study participation judge investigator Involvement planning conduct study ( applies Wellspect HealthCare staff staff study site ) Previous enrollment present study Simultaneous participation another clinical study may interfere present study , judge investigator Severe noncompliance protocol judge investigator and/or Wellspect HealthCare
